ygData.subject: Re: Just a bit of fun (longish)
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing that pains me more then anything is to see a Bard that ONLY uses bellow in combat :(  I have been spending time in High Keep for the last few levels,
ygData.messageBody:
One thing that pains me more then anything is to see a Bard that ONLY uses
bellow in combat :( I have been spending time in High Keep for the last few
levels, and when I see a message flash across my screen showing a bard just
bellowing his/her heart out I wince. When I am not in my regular group I
always explain the tactics I will be using with something like this:
Tonight's song list consists of the following in regular combat: Anthem 'de
Arms (boast str, atk speed), Psalm of warth (grp damage shield and AC),
chains (slow atk spd and snare). Do not snare or root unless I call for it.

Then a second one saying:
If a gob is glowing red and I am not attacking leave it alone I mesmirizing
it. If I call out charming so and so, I have charmed that gob.

Many groups I have been in are amazed that one- I do not use bellow :), two-
that I can keep three song effects going.

But for the life of me I can not understand why they whine so much when I
say good night, lol.


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
